original_text: You did great miracles to show your power against Pharaoh, his officers and all his people. You knew that they were being cruel to your people. You showed everyone that you are a great God. And people still know that it is true.
korean_text: 이적과 기사를 베푸사 바로와 그의 모든 신하와 그의 나라 온 백성을 치셨사오니 이는 그들이 우리의 조상들에게 교만하게 행함을 아셨음이라 주께서 오늘과 같이 명예를 얻으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: to show your power against Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 바로에게 대항하는 당신의 능력을 보이시기 위해

sentences.original_text: his officers and all his people
You knew that they were being cruel
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 잔인하다는 것을 알고 계셨습니다

sentences.original_text: You showed everyone that you are a great God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 모두에게 당신이 위대한 하나님이심을 보이셨습니다

sentences.original_text: And people still know that it is true
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들은 그것이 참된 것임을 여전히 압니다
